page.title: 31A Day in the Life
page.content:
Dear Diary,

I woke up at 10:00am very tired still, excited about going swimming with Robyn. We couldn’t decide which pool we were going to but we ended up going to Bromley, Pavilion.

When we arrived we got dressed in our costumes and went for a swim. I went on both waterslides.

After about one and a half hours we went into Bromley and had McDonald’s, then we had a little browse and we came back home for dinner.


Pupil-Montbelle School
